answers.answer: Hi, the symptom described by you could be due to neuropathy. It is a disorder of the nerves which causes numbness, tingling, unusual sensations and sometimes pain. Diabetes Mellitus can cause neuropathy. Other causes like vitamin deficiencies, alcohol consumption and certain medications can cause neuropathy. You may need to consult your primary care physician to detect the cause for your symptoms. Regards.

question: for about 3-4 days now i have had spells of rapid twitching/spasms above my left ear and they last for about 2-5 seconds and its like it pulses very fast nothing else is out the ordinary
title: rapid spasms above left ear
